TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NSCacheDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void WillEvictObject (this Foundation.INSCacheDelegate This, Foundation.NSCache cache, Foundation.NSObject obj);
.method public static hidebysig void WillEvictObject(class Foundation.INSCacheDelegate This, class Foundation.NSCache cache, class Foundation.NSObject obj) cil managed
